summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6207 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Madison Street Cable-Railway Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by 32nd Avenue North, East Highland Drive, 33rd Avenue North and East Madison Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88411, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
